p:
Plant extracts are complex mixtures providing a rich arsenal of molecules with high redox potential
13 , such as flavanones, flavones, flavonols and chalcones, fatty acids, amino acids, terpenoids, aldehydes, and alcohols
14 . Furthermore, biogenic synthesis produces large amounts of highly stable nanoparticles with a better-defined size than some conventional methods since phytochemicals compounds that are used in the reaction also act as stabilizing agents
15, 16 .
